definitions: A dirty or untidy state of things or of a place.
A thing or collection of things causing a dirty or untidy state.
A person who is dirty or untidy.
Used euphemistically to refer to the excrement of a domestic animal.
A situation that is confused and full of problems.
A person whose life is confused and full of problems.
A building or room providing meals and recreational facilities for members of the armed forces.
A large amount or quantity of.
